siteSettings.title: English Adventures: Past Perfect & Past Perfect Continuous

lesson.title: Past Perfect Simple & Continuous + Used to / Would

modules.name: Learn
modules.title: Past Perfect Lessons
modules.instructions: Master Past Perfect Simple & Continuous, telling stories in the correct order, duration before a past moment, used to/would for past habits, and when NOT to overuse Past Perfect!

modules.name: Write
modules.title: Storytelling Practice
modules.instructions: Write dramatic past stories using Past Perfect correctly — the earlier action = Past Perfect, the later = Past Simple. No 'when' mix-ups, no missing 'had', and perfect used to/would!

modules.name: Play
modules.title: Time Detective Games
modules.instructions: Play exciting games to choose Past Perfect vs Past Simple, spot missing 'had', fix used to/would mistakes, and catch wrong Past Perfect Continuous.

modules.name: Quiz
modules.title: Quick Quiz
modules.instructions: Test your knowledge with multiple choice questions about past perfect tenses. Choose the correct answer to practice quickly!

modules.name: Apply
modules.title: Past Perfect Master Challenge
modules.instructions: Apply Past Perfect rules perfectly in real-life stories, regrets, and life-before moments.
